review: I've just started using the box version.  I like the voice command and hope that it soon expands to more than searches within Amazon but I won't hold my breath.  I particularly like how quickly my choices load, buffer, and play.  Its almost instantaneous and never has there been an issue of the the output exceeding the buffering capacity (I have 3 Mbps).  Previously, using the Amazon Prime service, I would have to wait for the connection to establish and the selection to load.  No more.With the Fire TV, if I am watching a TV series, the next episode is displayed in the bottom right of the screen and can be started with a single click instead of going back to the menu and clicking to the next episode.  I'm sure there are improvements to come and looking forward to them.
